meta_description: Discover the history of the Chippewa Valley at the Chippewa Valley Museum in Eau Claire, WI. Explore engaging exhibits, historic buildings, and fascinating artifacts that tell the story of the region. Plan your visit today!
hours_text:
Hours & Admission

### When to Visit & What it Costs

  * [Home](/ "Home")
  * Visit
  * Hours & Admission

Please feel free to ask questions relating to the history of the Chippewa Valley at [info@cvmuseum.com](mailto:info@cvmuseum.com), or by connecting with us on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/chippewavalleymuseum/ "CVM Facebook").

## When to visit

### • Closed Tuesday, Jan 6th due to winter weather

**Monday:** Closed  
**Tuesday: **5 pm - 8 pm  
**Wednesday:** 12 pm - 5 pm  
**Thursday:** 12 pm - 5 pm  
**Friday:** 12 pm - 5 pm  
**Saturday:** 10 am - 5 pm  
**Sunday:** Closed  
  
 _Sunnyview School, Anderson Log Home_ , and the _Paul Bunyan Logging Camp & Visitor Center_ are closed for the season.

### • Admission

Visit our main exhibit halls and museum store.

Adults - $12  
Seniors - $10 (62+)  
Students - $5 (with valid school ID)  
Ages 5-17 - $5  
Under 5 - free  
  
 _*General Admission for museum members is always free.  
_  
Discounted admission available through the  _[Museums for All](https://museums4all.org/ "Museums for All link")_ program: $2.00 per person, available to SNAP/WIC/Medicaid participants.

## • Wisconsin Logging Museum

**Wisconsin Logging museum** is **closed for the season** and will reopen for summer of 2026.  

## • Schlegelmilch House

This middleclass merchant family home is located in downtown Eau Claire, and is available for group tours and event rental by special arrangement ([find out more](http://www.cvmuseum.com/visit/priva...

in

at the Chippewa Valley Museum

Visit

[**View Our Hours**](/visit/hours-admissions/ "VIEW OUR HOURS")

Explore Below

## Can't make it in today?

Make a sneak peak visit with your phone, tablet, or desktop/laptop with our 360° virtual tour.

### Hope to see you soon.

[Take the 360° Virtual Tour __](https://posthousevideo.com/20-11%20CVM_MobileVT2/ "Virtual tour link")

## Send Us Questions

We're working to inspire curiosity by collecting, preserving, and sharing our region's history and culture. Feel free to contact us with questions., and we'll get back to you with an answer.**  
  
**[  
](mailto:info@cvmuseum.com "Email US")[  
](https://www.facebook.com/chippewavalleymuseum/ "Facebook")[  
](https://www.instagram.com/chippewa_valley_museum/ "Instagram")   
Or, use our****[Contact Form __](https://www.cvmuseum.com/contact/ "Contact Form")

Looking for things to do in Eau Claire? How about a place to spark your curiosity, connect with others, and find inspiration? As a favorite attraction in the area, we tell surprising, entertaining, and authentic stories about Wisconsin's Chippewa Valley helping to tell the larger story of America. 

[Let’s explore together.](explore/museum-exhibits/ "Let’s explore together.")
